header.title: Software Developer
header.summary: A passionate and self-motivated software developer with high level of experience working on multiple projects. Versatile Full Stack Web Developer with more than 1+ year of professional experience developing consumer focused websites. Talented in project management, team leadership and independent problem-solving. Highly organized multitasking with expertise in scheduling projects, enhancing designs and verifying code. Looking to join organization where opportunity for growth and professional development is embraced.

Testing: Prepared test plans and test cases for testing site frontend.
